column4: hello how to view proxy squid?so i could test my proxy squid in winxp browser if its workin or not
you have to set the machine running the proxy as the proxy server on the winxp machine
jame1:i just want to test it in windowsxp
well in Firefox, open the options dialog and click Connection Settings. There you can specify a proxy server
then you just type in the IP address of the machine running proxy and all requests will be routed through it instead
